mapper.insert: insert into mkt_script (SCRIPT_ID, SCRIPT_NAME, SCRIPT_DESC, SCRIPT_TYPE, SUIT_CHANNEL_TYPE, EXEC_CHANNEL, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{scriptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scriptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scriptDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scriptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suitChannelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{execChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update mkt_script set SCRIPT_NAME = #{scriptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCRIPT_DESC = #{scriptDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCRIPT_TYPE = #{scriptType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUIT_CHANNEL_TYPE = #{suitChannelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXEC_CHANNEL = #{execChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SCRIPT_ID = #{scriptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select SCRIPT_ID, SCRIPT_NAME, SCRIPT_DESC, SCRIPT_TYPE, SUIT_CHANNEL_TYPE, EXEC_CHANNEL, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_script where SCRIPT_ID = #{scriptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
